Visit

The next time
youre in Vail

Come enjoy our interactive exhibits and free admission, Vail's Colorado Snowsports Museum tells the rich story of skiing and snowboarding in Colorado.
Visit us

Hall of Fame

Celebrate Colorados
heroes of snow sports

The Hall of Fame has inducted more than 250 athletes, sport builders, pioneers. and inspirational icons of snow sports in Colorado since its first class in 1977.
Learn more

Were right here!

Support

Your support allows us to celebrate Colorado snow sports by telling stories and hosting events that educate and inspire others to seek adventure.
